Text.Page:
{@LinkCreature:246#3001#Hurun} sent a message requesting help at the Three Towers.

Given your assistance to date, we thought you'd be the perfect choice to assist him.

I'm quite jealous, actually. I always wanted to study the Three Towers up close.

Thank goodness! The argons keep killing our researchers, so I'm glad they sent a soldier.

The {@LinkCreature:46#201#argonomorph kulkari crushers} or {@LinkCreature:46#202#shamans}, or even the {@LinkCreature:46#203#argonomorph Lokian slayers} are the big threats. Take them out to relieve the pressure on us.

Of course, no one would cry if you destroyed {@LinkCreature:246#3010#cyasma conduits} instead.

Anything would help.

It's good to sting the argon war machine once in awhile.

I'm grateful for your intercession, . Thank you.
